definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: As a result, their spoken English might not improve.
sentences.chinese: 所以，他们的英语口语可能得不到提高。

sentences.english: Excellent written and spoken translation skills.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的书面及口语翻译技巧。

sentences.english: Do you take GESE in level two?
sentences.chinese: 你报考三一口语二级吗？

sentences.english: However, Mask-bot is not yet able to understand much of the spoken word.
sentences.chinese: 然而，面具机器人尚未能理解大多数的口语。

sentences.english: Professor Li, from Beijing University, will give a talk on how to improve our listening and spoken English.
sentences.chinese: 北大李教授将作如何提高英语听力和口语能力的报告。

sentences.english: Interjections are an active part of speech in the spoken language.
sentences.chinese: 叹词在口语中是相当活跃的词类。

sentences.english: My spoken English is fairly good enough to express myself fluently.
sentences.chinese: 我能用英语口语把本人的念法流利地表达出来。

sentences.english: Oral composition and 3-minute training method: This method is suitable for intense training.
sentences.chinese: 口语作文和3分钟训练法:此法适用于强化训练。

sentences.english: Must have excellent command of English both spoken and written.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的英文口语和英文书写能力。

sentences.english: English movies are first-rate supplements but should never be substitutes for textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 电影是口语学习的补充，但代替不了教材。

sentences.english: Plain, simple words and sentences from daily oral language were used in poetry.
sentences.chinese: 口语化是卞之琳诗歌语言的特点之一。

sentences.english: I am so glad to study English In well education.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴能够在韦沃教育学习英语口语。

sentences.english: Good in speaking and writing, we need Chinese and English resume.
sentences.chinese: 良好的口语和写作能力，需附中英文简历。

sentences.english: How can I improve my spoken English?
sentences.chinese: 我该怎样才能提高口语水准？

sentences.english: Oral English communicate and writing ability.
sentences.chinese: 英语口语交流及书写能力。

sentences.english: Now the frist Oral English Competition of Caijia Primary Schooll is over.
sentences.chinese: 蔡家小学首届英语口语比赛到此全部结束。

definition: TOEFL/Test of English as a Foreign Language
(old) thanks to your lucky influence (polite reply to health inquiries)
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
